Serializer<Identifier>  
 

Class Summary
BufferReader<Identifier> Reads a ByteBuffer to the socket then calls receiveResult().
BufferReaderWriter<Identifier> Concurrently reads a buffer and writes a buffer at the same time, then calls the continuation when done.
BufferWriter<Identifier> Writes a ByteBuffer to the socket then calls receiveResult().
DefaultCallback<Identifier,MessageType>  
DefaultErrorHandler<Identifier> Just logs the problems.
